events.title: Epstein's Status Assessment and Legal Visit
events.description: On July 27, 2019, inmate Jeffrey Epstein was assessed by staff member Darlene. He was reported as stable, had a legal visit with his attorney lasting about 12 hours, and complained about dehydration due to limited bathroom breaks and anxiety about returning to the SHU.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (implied context of incarceration)
SHU (Special Housing Unit, implied location within the correctional facility)
keyFacts: On July 27, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was on 'Suicide Watch None' and 'Psych Observation' status.
Epstein complained of dehydration because he could not drink enough water during his approximately 12-hour legal visits due to limited bathroom breaks.
Epstein expressed anxiety about returning to the SHU (Special Housing Unit) and an inability to sleep there due to noise from other inmates.
The email chain shows internal communication about monitoring Epstein's status shortly before his death in August 2019.
